name: CYBERARK EPV [Add Safe]
description: CyberArk Enterprise Password Vault (EPV) reported a safe was added.

name: CYBERARK EPV [Rename Safe]
description: CyberArk Enterprise Password Vault (EPV) reported a safe was renamed.

name: CYBERARK EPV [Delete Safe]
description: CyberArk Enterprise Password Vault (EPV) reported a safe was deleted.

name: CYBERARK EPV [Administrator Logon]
description: CyberArk Enterprise Password Vault (EPV) reported an administrator logged on. These accounts have a high level of access and should be monitored closely.

name: CYBERARK EPM [<%= eventname %>]
description: This rule looks for Cyberark EPM events on eventtype attacks.

name: CYBERARK EPM [<%= eventname %>]
description: This rule looks for Cyberark EPM blocked events.
